country-number.terms-of-service-description: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Your number subscription auto-renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period, renewal is charged within 24 hours at the then current rate and fees. No refunds once the number is used or if it isn’t returned within 5 hours of purchase.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.section-1-content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you interact with our services. By using our platform, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
privacy-policy.section-2-content: Your data is secure. We do not share your personal information with third parties. All data is stored securely and used only to enhance your eSIM experience
